body: Instead of `op_api_` can we call it `api_def_`? Keeping the names parallel to their intent might make things slightly easier to follow (avoiding a unnecessary indirection in the reader's cognitive map of the code :)
body_html: Instead of op_api_ can we call it api_def_? Keeping the names parallel to their intent might make things slightly easier to follow (avoiding a unnecessary indirection in the reader's cognitive map of the code :)
body_text: Instead of op_api_ can we call it api_def_? Keeping the names parallel to their intent might make things slightly easier to follow (avoiding a unnecessary indirection in the reader's cognitive map of the code :)
